summary: IT/Electrical engineer with 10+ years across O&M and projects: Linux/macOS automation, SCADA/MMIS, preventive maintenance, availability reporting, troubleshooting, Python; safety & compliance.

roles.title: Operations & Maintenance Engineer
highlights: MMIS & SCADA operations; preventive maintenance; failure trend analysis
Availability/shift/downtime (DOA/STIP) reporting; documentation updates with engineering
Training/oversight of technicians and subcontractors; scheduling; safety compliance

roles.title: Electrical Engineer
highlights: Lighting maintenance; drawings analysis; safety committees; overhead crane ops; elevator maintenance
Method statements & risk assessments; approvals; policy updates; training

roles.title: Electrical Engineer
highlights: Fire alarm & firefighting maintenance/rectification; acceptance testing (continuity & hi‑pot/insulation)
Field safety resource for incident reporting and safe behaviors

roles.title: Electrical Engineer
highlights: Fire detection & alarm maintenance; rigorous installation/operations
